articles.description: The small steel city of Rourkela will be one of the two cities in Odisha that will play host to the 2023 Men's Hockey World Cup. Here's how they have prepared for the tournament.
articles.content: TV Newsmakers Today: Tunisha Sharmas mother faints at funeral, Reem Shaikh criticises media reporters

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Ashwin gives a mouth-shutting reply to his critics - Rediff.com
articles.description: Ashwin has taken a slight dig at people who perceive him as an 'overthinker'
articles.content:
Overthinking is a perception that has followed me since my debut, says Ashwin
